brewery.brewery_description:
GROUNDED ROOTS. OPEN WATERS. 

Carefully crafted, refined, and perfected until we’re ready to send them out into the world, every Sloop beer is brewed with love, care, and attention. Founded in 2011 by Adam Watson and Justin Taylor, Sloop is grounded in the craft and tradition of brewing and always seeking new beers, new tastes, and new experiences.

Hudson Valley // New York

Sloop beer is currently available in AL, CT, DC, FL, KY, MA, MD, ME, NC, NH, NJ, NY, PA, RI, SC, TN, VA, VT, and WI. Can’t find us near you? Tell your local bottle shop and craft beer bars to get it in!

venue.venue_name: CJ's Doghouse Bottle Shop & Growler Shop

beer.beer_description: With Citra and Mosaic hops, it’s a home run for your taste buds.

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 165 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 34!

beer.beer_description: Green Islands is an unfiltered IPA brewed with oats. The oats give the beer a slightly silky smooth body, and the hops give the beer dank, citrusy, tropical nots. The finish is a refreshing tropical flavor of tangerine pith. A classic IPA with a new school twist.

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 175 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 36!

beer.beer_description:
MOSAIC & HBC-630 BOMB // The latest BOMB mash-up from Sloop brings together the fruitiness of Mosaic & the complexity of HBC-630.

Notes of tropical mango, sweet cotton candy, & Cara Cara orange.

items.badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 300 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 61! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

user.bio: I'm pretty good at drinking beer

beer.beer_description: Sitting at the post position, Sloop Exacta bomb is a safe bet to land in the winner’s circle. Exclusively hopped with Citra hops, this beer tastes light and citrusy and will keep your glass “half full” even if it is not your day at the track. No matter how your day is going, Sloop Exacta Bomb will ensure that you finish in the money!

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least That's 495 distinct venues!

beer.beer_description: Also called “Heller Bock” (meaning “Pale Bock”), this German-style lager is traditionally paler in color and more hop-centric than other Bock beers. This version of lager is stronger than most. Sloop’s interpretation of this traditional German brew clocks in at 7.8% ABV but drinks easy; perfect for the fall weather.

Light, bright, & perfect for warmer weather. 

A simple grain bill forms the perfect canvas for the bright fruitiness of Pacific Northwest hops & a sprinkle of magical green glitter.
Juice Bomb’s big brother! This ridiculously hopped double IPA has a big, orange aroma w/ flavor notes of passionfruit, papaya & citrus.
beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy

user.bio: You son of a bitch, I’m in!

beer.beer_description:
Brewed with only the finest ingredients, Sloop Premium Lager is crisp, refreshing, & easy drinking.With European hops, carefully blended malted barley,&
perfectly balanced water, Sloop Premium is cold lagered for classic flavor, color, and aroma.

The finest hops & the finest barley — for the finest lager.

Also called “Heller Bock” (meaning “Pale Bock”), this German-style lager is traditionally paler in color and more hop-centric than other Bock beers. This version of lager is stronger than most. Sloop’s interpretation of this traditional German brew clocks in at 7.8% ABV but drinks easy; perfect for the fall weather.

items.badge_description: Celebrating Pride doesn't stop when June ends. Thanks for supporting the Queer community 365 days out of the year by checking in a beer from one of these Queer-owned and Queer-led breweries! Now keep going. Try 5 more for Level 29.

beer.beer_description: Brewed exclusively with Citra hops, this riff on Juice Bomb showcases the nuances of Citra — dank, juicy notes of grapefruit, melon, lychee, and a true blast of tropical aroma with a resiny, balanced flavor.

items.badge_description: Celebrating Pride doesn't stop when June ends. Thanks for supporting the Queer community 365 days out of the year by checking in a beer from one of these Queer-owned and Queer-led breweries! Now keep going. Try 5 more for Level 20.

beer.beer_description: A hazy, golden, unfiltered IPA.The low bitterness and late hopping showcase the citrusy, juicy notes of American hops. A blast of tropical aroma is followed by a resiny and balanced flavor. Juice bomb features all the aspects and nuances of full hop flavor, not just bitterness — providing an upfront but easy drinking beer.

items.badge_description: A big juicy burger, some golden brown french fries, and a pint of your favorite brewskie. What more could you want? That's a beer at 40 different venus with the category of Burger Joint. Try 5 more for Level 9!

beer.beer_description: A hazy, golden, unfiltered IPA.The low bitterness and late hopping showcase the citrusy, juicy notes of American hops. A blast of tropical aroma is followed by a resiny and balanced flavor. Juice bomb features all the aspects and nuances of full hop flavor, not just bitterness — providing an upfront but easy drinking beer.

A hazy, golden, unfiltered IPA.The low bitterness and late hopping showcase the citrusy, juicy notes of American hops. A blast of tropical aroma is followed by a resiny and balanced flavor. Juice bomb features all the aspects and nuances of full hop flavor, not just bitterness — providing an upfront but easy drinking beer.

user.bio: I am running away from my responsibilites, and it feels good. - Michael Scott

beer.beer_description: A hazy, golden, unfiltered IPA.The low bitterness and late hopping showcase the citrusy, juicy notes of American hops. A blast of tropical aroma is followed by a resiny and balanced flavor. Juice bomb features all the aspects and nuances of full hop flavor, not just bitterness — providing an upfront but easy drinking beer.

Super Soft is an IPA with no boil hops for a finish that lands on the palate with the delicacy of a ton of feathers. The aroma is full of ripe, pungent tropical fruit and citrus. The flavor has notes of red grapefruit, papaya with hints of black tea.

Light, bright, & perfect for warmer weather. 

A simple grain bill forms the perfect canvas for the bright fruitiness of Pacific Northwest hops & a sprinkle of magical green glitter.

NO Pumpkin IPA is a Fall Seasonal IPA that is flavored without the use of pumpkin, or spices. That's right NO PUMPKIN in the beer! We feel that this trend, and these particular flavors are gross in beer and many other pumpkin infused items you will be experiencing this fall. The real flavor from this IPA comes from the hops not some useless squash. There are fruity notes of blackeberry, boysenberry and grape. So enjoy your pumpkin spice, chai, mocha, latte this fall, but when you and your palette needs a break from pumpkin invasion grab a Sloop NO Pumpkin.

2016 World Beer Cup Gold Medal Winner // Best American Sour.

The conflict of flavors in this dry hopped sour ale combine to create a truly unique beer. Our house lactic culture creates a tart, sour base, contrasted with an intense Citra and Galaxy dry hopping. The aroma showcases citrusy, fruity elements and the finish tastes of freshly squeezed grapefruit juice.

Finally, a holiday beer brewed without candy canes, cinnamon or a single gingerbread house! Notes of cotton candy and green grape skin come from where they should — hops, barley, yeast, and water — NOT naughty spices. This beer is in honor of all those who know you don’t need over-marketed “flavors of Christmas” to enjoy a beer with the holidays.

A berlinerweisse style ale with the tartness of a sour beer and the balance of real peaches. The pale and wheat malts give it a cloudy appearance and smooth flavor. The Sauer Peach is fermented with real peaches to provide a sweet and refreshing flavor great for summer days or to brighten a winter night — and the sour lactic culture provides a tart finish to balance out the sweetness of the peach.
The Sauer Peach is the perfect balance of sour and sweet to quench the thirst of any beer enthusiast.

beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beer.beer_description: Juice Bomb’s big brother! This ridiculously hopped double IPA has a big, orange aroma w/ flavor notes of passionfruit, papaya & citrus.

Brewed exclusively with Citra hops, this riff on Juice Bomb showcases the nuances of Citra — dank, juicy notes of grapefruit, melon, lychee, and a true blast of tropical aroma with a resiny, balanced flavor.

Green Islands is an unfiltered IPA brewed with oats. The oats give the beer a slightly silky smooth body, and the hops give the beer dank, citrusy, tropical nots. The finish is a refreshing tropical flavor of tangerine pith. A classic IPA with a new school twist.

Brewed exclusively with Simcoe hops, this riff on Juice Bomb showcases the nuances of Simcoe hops — piney, resiny juice notes, with a blast of tropical sherbet aroma and resiny balanced flavor. A hazy, golden, unfiltered IPA, Simcoe Bomb features a full hop flavor, not just bitterness — providing an upfront but easy drinking beer.
Our flagship Juice Bomb got the ole’ DDH treatment, packing an extra heavy load of juicy, hoppy goodness. Notes of melon on the nose, followed by a wallop of orange pulp and grapefruit.

Brewed with flaked wheat & malted wheat & dry hopped with hops from down under. A fruity flavor profile with notes of stone fruit, passion fruit, & orange. No boil hops! Just a light, soft, refreshing blast of haze. Like walking on clouds.
This single-hop riff on Juice Bomb was designed to showcase the nuances of Mosaic Hops. Notes of mixed berries, tropical fruit sherbet, and melon shine through.
Brewed exclusively w/ Rakau & Motueka from Australia & New Zealand, Down Under Bomb has big flavors of peach skin, lemon verbena, & fresh, ripe Juicy Fruit.
A juicy smooth IPA. Aromas of melon, cantaloupe rind and mango. Flavors of honeydew melon, strawberry, notes of of pineapple and candy.

The latest in our line of half-baked stouts, Coco Baked is a deep, slick, smooth, full bodied stout brewed with oatmeal, lactose, and totally toasted coconut.

A stout to remind you of warmer times. Like a pina colada for the winter. If pina coladas were oatmeal stouts.

Lupulin Mutant is a hazy golden IPA brewed with a blend of hops from Australia and the Pacific Northwest: Galaxy and Citra. The aroma hits you with dank tangerines and lemons. The flavor finishes bright, juicy, and SUPER crushable. So good it's uncanny.

Brewed with milk sugar, flaked wheat, and malted wheat for aromas of green melon and mango, flavor notes of orange sherbet and grapefruit, a smooth, creamy mouthfeel, and a big, bold, hoppy finish. Keep your tastebuds on alert for the Techno Viking invasion! THE FUTURE IS NOW.

Brewed exclusively with Nelson Sauvin hops, this one off riff on Juice Bomb showcases the nuances of Nelson Sauvin hops — dank, earthy, juicy, white wine-like notes with a tropical blast of gooseberry and kiwi aroma, a fluffy white head, and a resiny balanced flavor. A hazy, golden, unfiltered IPA, Nelson Bomb features a full hop flavor, not just bitterness — providing an upfront but easy drinking beer.
Brewed with milk sugar, malted oats, and flaked oats. Notes of orange marmalade, grapefruit zest, and hints of peach rings with a beautifully smooth mouthfeel.

A hazy, golden, unfiltered IPA with an XXL dose of TWO dry-hop additions. This DDH Mosaic Bomb tastes like tangerines and clementines. A blast of flavor and smooth hop bite will rock your palate out of this world.
Cashmere Bomb is hazy, smooth, & citrusy. Mango aromas & flavor notes of cantaloupe & gummy candies lead up to an herbal, hoppy finish. The Sloop BOMB series: real hop flavor for real hop lovers.

Fear does not exist in this dojo. Pain does not exist in this dojo. Defeat does not exist in this dojo.
.
Our latest IPA is boldly brewed w/ malted oats & flaked oats, hopped w/ motueka, mosaic, & hallertau blanc for maximum IPA pleasure, & has big flavors of lime zest, candied ginger, & lychee for the win.
.
Strike first. Strike hard. NO MERCY.
India Pale Ale w/ flaked wheat, flaked oats, & Citra Cryo & Cashmere hops.
